org.trianacode.enactment

Class TrianaExec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.enactment.TrianaExec
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandLineExec

    public class TrianaExec
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for executing a Triana taskgraph. TrianaExec assumes that each taskgraph invocation will correspond with a single set of output data, and thereby synchronizes multiple invocations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  TrianaExec.ExecRun 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long DATA_SLEEP_TIME
      the time in milliseconds that the manager threads sleep when waiting for the previous data to be sent/the data to arrive.

      TrianaExec(Tool tool)
      Constructs a TrianaExec to execute a clone of the specified tool.

        TaskGraphException

    • Method Detail

      • getTaskGraph

        public TaskGraph getTaskGraph()
        Returns:
        the taskgraph that is being executed. If a single task was executed then this returns that task wrapped in a simple taskgraph.

      • getTask

        public Task getTask()
        Returns:
        the task that is being executed.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Returns:
        true if the taskgraph has finished executing

      • run

        public java.lang.Object[] run(java.lang.Object[] data)
                       throws TaskGraphException,
                              SchedulerException
        Executes the taskgraph using the specified input data array. Automatically unpacks any result data contained in data messages.
        Throws:
        TaskGraphException
        SchedulerException

      • run

        public java.lang.Object[] run(java.lang.Object[] data,
                     boolean unpack)
                       throws TaskGraphException,
                              SchedulerException
        Executes the taskgraph using the specified input data array.
        Parameters:
        unpack - sets whether data within data messages is automatically unpacked in the results array
        Throws:
        TaskGraphException
        SchedulerException

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Dispose of the TrianaExec and clean up the threads
